amendment.description: Amendment to state no funds in this act may be used to transfer a detainee at Guantanamo Bay to any other location.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in House Report 114-623 to state no funds in this act may be used to transfer a detainee at Guantanamo Bay to any other location.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Hudson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
